description: Northamptonshire Police says the fire was put out shortly after crews arrived.
title: River Nene canal boat fires in Towcester under investigation.
title_page: River Nene canal boat fires in Towcester under investigation.  - BBC News
maintext:
Emergency services were called to a fire involving two canal boats.
Northamptonshire Fire and Rescue attended the blaze on the River Nene at Old Towcester Road, Northampton at about 19:50 GMT.
Northamptonshire Police said the fire was put out shortly after crews arrived, adding that investigators were on site on Sunday to determine the cause.
The details of any injuries and the extent of damage are not clear at this stage.
